description: End-to-end DevOps engineering services to streamline software development, testing, and deployment processes. In general, can be used to address any technical HRI or MRI
justification: DevOps practices help address security, operations, and organizational outcomes through automation, monitoring, and robust processes.

description: Ongoing management and optimization of your AWS cloud environment to ensure performance, security, and cost-efficiency.
justification: Managed services help ensure security, operations, and optimization best practices are continually addressed.
